name: Madespace
description: Madespace is an AI-powered interior design platform that enables users to create, shop for, and get expert help on room designs without needing design skills.
longDescription: Madespace is an innovative AI-driven interior design studio founded by interior designers Kele Dobrinski and Christina Valencia, aimed at making professional-level design accessible to everyone. The platform uses generative AI trained by experts to transform user-uploaded room photos into customizable, shoppable designs. It eliminates the need for text prompts, allowing visual blending of styles and intuitive editing to solve the problem of expensive traditional design services. Users can design spaces for various rooms like living rooms or bedrooms, shop directly from generated designs, and access professional consultations. Overall, Madespace democratizes interior design by combining AI technology with human expertise to help users confidently create beautiful spaces.
features: AI-powered room redesign allows users to upload photos and generate instant design alternatives tailored to their space.
Visual design interface enables creation without text prompts, making it accessible for non-designers.
Style blending capabilities let users mix aesthetics like modern, boho, or Scandinavian for unique interiors.
Instant shopping integration connects designs to real retailers for direct purchases of furniture and decor.
Expert video chat support provides professional advice from interior designers on demand.
Customizable layouts offer drag-and-drop editing of furnishings and accessories with endless revisions.
Professionally trained AI ensures high-quality, spatially consistent designs directed by experienced designers.
Support for various room types including living rooms, bedrooms, and dining areas with predefined styles.
On-demand previews generate multiple variations to explore creative options quickly.
iOS app exclusivity delivers a mobile-first experience for convenient design on the go.

faqs.question: What is Madespace AI and how does it work?
faqs.answer: Madespace AI is an iPhone app that transforms room photos into shoppable interior design concepts. You upload a photo of your room, select a style preference, and the AI generates multiple design variations that you can purchase directly through the app.

faqs.question: Is Madespace AI worth the cost?
faqs.answer: For iPhone users seeking affordable interior design help, Madespace offers significant value at $29/month or $199/year compared to traditional design services costing $150-500 per hour. However, it works best for contemporary design styles.

faqs.question: Can I actually buy the furniture shown in Madespace designs?
faqs.answer: Yes, Madespace integrates with established retailers like West Elm, CB2, and Article. Every design shows clear pricing and allows direct purchase through the app, though some items may have longer delivery times.

faqs.question: Does Madespace work on Android phones?
faqs.answer: No, Madespace is currently iPhone exclusive. There is no Android version available as of 2025, which significantly limits accessibility for many users.

faqs.question: What design styles does Madespace AI specialize in?
faqs.answer: Madespace excels at contemporary, minimalist, Scandinavian, and California casual styles. Itâ€™s less effective for traditional, maximalist, or highly eclectic design preferences due to its training by Southern California interior designers.

faqs.question: How do I get started with Madespace?
faqs.answer: Download the Madespace app from the App Store, sign up for an account, and start by uploading a photo of your room to generate designs. The free version allows up to 3 room designs to try basic features.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial or plan available?
faqs.answer: Yes, Madespace offers a free version with limited access to 3 room designs and basic AI features. Paid subscriptions unlock unlimited designs and expert support.

faqs.question: Can I get human help with my designs?
faqs.answer: Yes, subscribers can access video chat consultations with professional interior designers for personalized advice.

faqs.question: What devices is Madespace compatible with?
faqs.answer: Madespace is currently only available as an iOS app for iPhones.

faqs.question: How accurate are the AI-generated designs?
faqs.answer: The designs maintain spatial consistency and are trained by professional designers, ensuring realistic and high-quality outputs suitable for real-world implementation.
